EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Your Interest, {!OnlineApplication__c.Application_Title__c} Instructions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in the uShip Fuel Card system, brought to you by WEX Fleet One. For your convenience, I have attached a link to our online application. Please note that the person listed on the Business Service Agreement (BSA) must be exactly the same as the individual whose electronic signature is on the EchoSign.
Please click on this link and follow the instructions to complete your application process.
Again, thank you for your interest in the uShip Fuel Card. If you have any questions about the application, please do not hesitate to call or email me.
